i5.las2peer.security

Class GroupAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.security.Agent
      • i5.las2peer.security.GroupAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XmlAble, MessageReceiver, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class GroupAgent
extends Agent
    An agent representing a group of other agents. The storage of the group information is stored encrypted in a similar manner to Envelope: The (symmetric) key to unlock the private key of the group is encrypted asymmetrically for each entitled agent (i.e. member of the group).

    • Constructor Summary

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String groupname)
             throws L2pSecurityException
        Sets a name for this group(-agent)
        Parameters:
        groupname - A name to be used for this group. This is no identifier! May have duplicates.
        Throws:
        L2pSecurityException - When the user agent is still locked.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name for this group.
        Returns:
        Returns the group name or null if no name was assigned.

      • setUserData

        public void setUserData(java.io.Serializable object)
                 throws L2pSecurityException
        Attaches the given object directly to this agent. The user data represent a field of this user agent and should be used with small values (< 1MB) only. Larger byte amounts could handicap the agent handling inside the network.
        Parameters:
        object - The user data object to be serialized and attached.
        Throws:
        L2pSecurityException - When the user agent is still locked.

      • getUserData

        public java.io.Serializable getUserData()
        get the user data assigned to this agent
        Returns:
        Returns the user data object
